doc.title: Sensommar
doc.plot: Sensommars action revolves around a bunch of friends who go from southern Sweden with car and caravan to go on a music festival in the northern part of the country. The gang consists of pair Ola and Josephine and their friends since school Niklas, Erik and Lisa. When the evening is approaching, so they decide to stay over night and run the rest of the way the following day. They stop in the most deserted and isolated parts of Värmland. Middle of the night so come buddy club to a group of men who rob, abuse and abuse them. Fast out of the wilderness without the possibility of protection of civilization, so it becomes a battle of survival. In the meeting with individuals who have no empathy, they must themselves ignore what is right and wrong in order to survive.
